      - text: |
          <script>
          // Fix Quarto category filtering bug
          window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            function filterByCategory(category) {
              // Decode the clicked category (e.g., "c3Rhbg==" -> "stan")
              const clickedCat = category ? atob(category) : '';

              // Filter posts manually
              document.querySelectorAll('.quarto-post').forEach(function(post) {
                const encoded = post.getAttribute('data-categories');
                if (!encoded && category !== '') {
                  post.style.display = 'none';
                  return;
                }
                try {
                  // Decode: base64 -> url-decode -> split by comma
                  const decoded = atob(encoded);
                  const categories = decodeURIComponent(decoded).split(',');

                  if (category === '' || categories.includes(clickedCat)) {
                    post.style.display = '';
                  } else {
                    post.style.display = 'none';
                  }
                } catch(e) {
                  if (category === '') {
                    post.style.display = '';
                  } else {
                    post.style.display = 'none';
                  }
                }
              });

              // Update active state on sidebar
              document.querySelectorAll('.quarto-listing-category .category').forEach(function(el) {
                el.classList.remove('active');
                if (el.getAttribute('data-category') === category) {
                  el.classList.add('active');
                }
              });
            }

            // Re-attach click handlers to category elements
            document.querySelectorAll('.quarto-listing-category .category').forEach(function(el) {
              el.onclick = function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                e.stopPropagation();
                filterByCategory(el.getAttribute('data-category'));
                return false;
              };
            });
          });
          </script>
